SyntaxLanguage.ExampleText: --[[ Sample Lua code ]] x = 10 -- global variable do -- new block local x = x -- new 'x', with value 10 print(x) --> 10 x = x + 1 do -- another block local x = x + 1 -- another 'x' print(x) --> 12 end print(x) --> 11 end print(x) --> 10 (the global one) print("Complete!")
